description: FAQ: more words about why GOMAXPROCS>1 might not speed you up

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as 0f051a61f3ba ***

FAQ: more words about why GOMAXPROCS>1 might not speed you up

R=golang-dev, adg, gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5572067

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5572067/diff/1001/doc/go_faq.html
File doc/go_faq.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5572067/diff/1001/doc/go_faq.html#newcode1034
doc/go_faq.html:1034: This is because of the significant context-switching
Perhaps turn around the sentence - as it is, it sounds like context switching is "too" expensive. E.g.:

This is because sending data between threads involves context-switching which is not free.

?

subject: code review 5572067: FAQ: more words about why GOMAXPROCS>1 might not speed ...
